introduction: Welcome to the first Tipsrunda Tuesday of 2021!

godisboxen.title: Audio from scratch in Go
godisboxen.description: Did you enjoy #go-conf2021? Do you have an itch for more Go? Why not read the full series of 'Audio from scratch' which is with Go.

godisboxen.title: The PGM-index - State of the Art index
godisboxen.description: Ever wondered if we had the best possible sorting and indexing methods done? It clearly isn't. Indexing using learning methods are coming in strong and PGM shows to be state-of-the-art, including a very fast build of the index.

godisboxen.title: Zotero - Keep track of your mind
godisboxen.description: Ever been in need of a way to keep track of references and more? Keeping track of your information in the brain? This might be the tool for you!

godisboxen.title: User power, not power users
godisboxen.description: '... htop and its design philosophy User power, not power users: htop and its design philosophy' - A superb read and insight into the mind behind htop!
